globalAbilities.name: Volskaya Ordnance
globalAbilities.tooltip: Deal three percent increased weapon damage for every 100 max life the target has more than you, up to 15 percent

globalAbilities.tooltip: When you use an ability, restore 10 percent of your max ammo

globalAbilities.name: Weapon Jammer
globalAbilities.tooltip: Dealing weapon damage negates 10 percent of the targets bonus attack speed and increases your attack speed by 10 percent for two seconds

globalAbilities.name: Amari’s Antidote
globalAbilities.tooltip: While healing an ally below 50 percent life with your weapon, deal 15 percent increased weapon healing

globalAbilities.name: El-Sa’Ka Suppressor

globalAbilities.name: Hardlight Accelerator

globalAbilities.name: The Closer
globalAbilities.tooltip: Critical hits reveal the target for three seconds

globalAbilities.name: Eye of the Spider
globalAbilities.tooltip: Deal 10 percent increased damage to enemies below 30 percent life.
